features.name: loan_amnt
features.description: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower. If at some point in time, the credit department reduces the loan amount, then it will be reflected in this value.

features.name: term
features.description: The number of payments on the loan. Values are in months and can be either 36 or 60.

features.name: installment
features.description: The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates.

features.name: emp_length
features.description: Employment length in years. Possible values are between 0 and 10 where 0 means less than one year and 10 means ten or more years.

features.name: home_ownership
features.description: The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration or obtained from the credit report. Our values are: RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER

features.name: annual_inc
features.description: The self-reported annual income provided by the borrower during registration.

features.name: verification_status
features.description: Indicates if income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified

features.name: purpose
features.description: A category provided by the borrower for the loan request.

features.name: open_acc
features.description: The number of open credit lines in the borrower's credit file.

features.name: total_acc
features.description: The total number of credit lines currently in the borrower's credit file

features.name: application_type
features.description: Indicates whether the loan is an individual application or a joint application with two co-borrowers

features.name: acc_now_delinq
features.description: The number of accounts on which the borrower is now delinquent.

features.name: tot_cur_bal
features.description: Total current balance of all accounts

features.name: total_cu_tl
features.description: Number of finance trades

features.name: mort_acc
features.description: Number of mortgage accounts.

features.name: num_actv_bc_tl
features.description: Number of currently active bankcard accounts

features.name: num_actv_rev_tl
features.description: Number of currently active revolving trades

features.name: num_op_rev_tl
features.description: Number of open revolving accounts

features.name: num_rev_accts
features.description: Number of revolving accounts

features.name: percent_bc_gt_75
features.description: Percentage of all bankcard accounts > 75% of limit.

features.name: pub_rec_bankruptcies
features.description: Number of public record bankruptcies

features.name: hardship_flag
features.description: Flags whether or not the borrower is on a hardship plan

features.name: debt_settlement_flag
features.description: Flags whether or not the borrower, who has charged-off, is working with a debt-settlement company.

features.name: workclass
features.description: Job category (e.g. Self-employed, Government officer)

features.name: education
features.description: Education level (master's, bachelor's etc.)

features.name: occupation
features.description: Job type (e.g. Tech-support, Craft-repair)

features.name: capital-gain
features.description: Monthly Salary

features.name: capital-loss
features.description: Monthly expenditure

features.name: hours-per-week
features.description: How many hours do the user work

All_Features.name: loan_amnt
All_Features.description: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower. If at some point in time, the credit department reduces the loan amount, then it will be reflected in this value.

All_Features.name: term
All_Features.description: The number of payments on the loan. Values are in months and can be either 36 or 60.

All_Features.name: int_rate
All_Features.description: Interest Rate on the loan

All_Features.name: installment
All_Features.description: The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates.

All_Features.name: grade
All_Features.description: LC assigned loan grade

All_Features.name: sub_grade
All_Features.description: LC assigned loan subgrade

All_Features.name: emp_length
All_Features.description: Employment length in years. Possible values are between 0 and 10 where 0 means less than one year and 10 means ten or more years.

All_Features.name: home_ownership
All_Features.description: The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration or obtained from the credit report. Our values are: RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER

All_Features.name: annual_inc
All_Features.description: The self-reported annual income provided by the borrower during registration.

All_Features.name: verification_status
All_Features.description: Indicates if income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified

All_Features.name: pymnt_plan
All_Features.description: Indicates if a payment plan has been put in place for the loan

All_Features.name: purpose
All_Features.description: A category provided by the borrower for the loan request.

All_Features.name: dti
All_Features.description: A ratio calculated using the borrower’s total monthly debt payments on the total debt obligations, excluding mortgage and the requested LC loan, divided by the borrower’s self-reported monthly income.

All_Features.name: delinq_2yrs
All_Features.description: The number of 30+ days past-due incidences of delinquency in the borrower's credit file for the past 2 years

All_Features.name: fico_range_low
All_Features.description: The lower boundary range the borrower’s FICO at loan origination belongs to.

All_Features.name: fico_range_high
All_Features.description: The upper boundary range the borrower’s FICO at loan origination belongs to.

All_Features.name: inq_last_6mths
All_Features.description: The number of inquiries in past 6 months (excluding auto and mortgage inquiries)

All_Features.name: mths_since_last_delinq
All_Features.description: The number of months since the borrower's last delinquency.

All_Features.name: open_acc
All_Features.description: The number of open credit lines in the borrower's credit file.

All_Features.name: pub_rec
All_Features.description: Number of derogatory public records

All_Features.name: revol_bal
All_Features.description: Total credit revolving balance

All_Features.name: revol_util
All_Features.description: Revolving line utilization rate, or the amount of credit the borrower is using relative to all available revolving credit.

All_Features.name: total_acc
All_Features.description: The total number of credit lines currently in the borrower's credit file

All_Features.name: initial_list_status
All_Features.description: The initial listing status of the loan. Possible values are – W, F

All_Features.name: last_fico_range_high
All_Features.description: The upper boundary range the borrower’s last FICO pulled belongs to.

All_Features.name: last_fico_range_low
All_Features.description: The lower boundary range the borrower’s last FICO pulled belongs to.

All_Features.name: collections_12_mths_ex_med
All_Features.description: Number of collections in 12 months excluding medical collections

All_Features.name: mths_since_last_major_derog
All_Features.description: Months since most recent 90-day or worse rating

All_Features.name: policy_code
All_Features.description: publicly available policy_code=1 new products not publicly available policy_code=2

All_Features.name: application_type
All_Features.description: Indicates whether the loan is an individual application or a joint application with two co-borrowers

All_Features.name: annual_inc_joint
All_Features.description: The combined self-reported annual income provided by the co-borrowers during registration

All_Features.name: acc_now_delinq
All_Features.description: The number of accounts on which the borrower is now delinquent.

All_Features.name: tot_coll_amt
All_Features.description: Total collection amounts ever owed

All_Features.description: Total current balance of all accounts

All_Features.description: Number of open trades in last 6 months
